doc.title: American Rumble
doc.plot: The concert film/documentary of the First Big NY Psychobilly Rumble, the unprecedented event filmed during Halloween 2000, American Rumble is the first film of its kind, featuring performances and interviews with the top bands in Psychobilly music, a genre which has remained on the underground for over twenty years as one of the original progeny of the Punk movement. The film includes the first American performances of the Nekromantix, the Scumrats, the final performance of Batmobile, and the breakup of Demented Are Go!. Hosted by Reverend Doom of Cult of the Psychic Fetus, Hillbilly Werewolf, and the international dominatrix Mistress Persephone.
